trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of tick marks in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control with respect to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> that the control implements.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a posição das marcas de escala num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref> controlar com respect para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> que implementa o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The TickPlacement enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: A enumeração de TickPlacement é utilizada para definir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that has tick marks that are located below the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração seguinte mostra um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>que tenha as marcas de escala que estão localizadas abaixo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A> property is set to BottomRight.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A>propriedade está definida como BottomRight.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.TickPlacement%2A>
**Exemplo de controlo de deslize**![ilustração de controlo de deslize](~/add/media/genericslider.png "ilustração de controlo de deslize ")

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above and below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> bar for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the left and right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As marcas de escala são apresentados acima e abaixo o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> barra para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>, ou para a esquerda e direita do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As marcas de escala são apresentadas abaixo o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>, ou à direita do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tick marks appear above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As marcas de escala são apresentados acima o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>, ou para a esquerda do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>.
